root: ^I haven't been here but an hour and negroes talkin' at me like I don't know who I am
^You have no idea who I am.
^I didn't know it was this bad here. It's only been...how many years...
^Your sister is...Doritha should be working her way in by now.
^I charge per question. You don't know who I am, so you're not getting the colored discount.
^I don't want that. Taste should do just fine.
^Not the kind on your tongue, the kind in your soul.
^Play me a record you think I'd like. Something like Miles. A little bit of brass.
^Then we'll talk with our indoor voices. Ghost to person.
^You should get back, kid. Unless you want to stay like that.
